title: Robbie Williams to quit Olympic closing ceremony for birth of child
description: Robbie Williams is believed to have pulled out of the London 2012 Olympic closing ceremony as his wife is due to give birth.
cleanContent: Robbie Williams is believed to have pulled out of the London 2012 Olympic closing ceremony as his wife is due to give birth.The much-loved singer is believed to have been rehearsing for the event recently and was expected to perform a medley of his hits along with a cover of David Bowie's Life on Mars? at the ceremony.He has been forced to pull out however as wife Ayda Field reaches her due date around the time of the closing ceremony, it has been reported.Williams' departure will be a blow for Olympics bosses, with the 38-year-old having received a very positive reaction from crowds at the Queen's Diamond Jubilee concert last month.																																																																								|  |
